impact: Severe humanitarian crisis with millions of deaths, exploitation of indigenous population
Decimation of elephant populations, forced labor systems
Displacement of indigenous populations, establishment of exploitative labor systems
Deindustrialization of Indian textile industry, famine conditions
Forced labor (mita system), environmental devastation, indigenous population decline
Forced cultivation systems, destruction of competitor crops, exploitation

Displacement and genocide of Aboriginal populations, land theft
